surjective_pow:
@[to_additive divisible_by.surjective_smul]
theorem rootable_by.surjective_pow (A α : Type _) [monoid A] [Pow A α] [Zero α] [rootable_by A α] {n : α} (hn : n ≠ 0) :
    function.surjective fun a : A => a ^ n := fun a => ⟨rootable_by.root a n, rootable_by.root_cancel a hn⟩
#align rootable_by.surjective_pow rootable_by.surjective_pow
smul_top_eq_top_of_divisible_by_int:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem smul_top_eq_top_of_divisible_by_int [divisible_by A ℤ] {n : ℤ} (hn : n ≠ 0) :
    «expr • » n («expr⊤» : add_subgroup A) = «expr⊤» :=
  add_subgroup.map_top_of_surjective _ fun a => ⟨divisible_by.div a n, divisible_by.div_cancel _ hn⟩
#align smul_top_eq_top_of_divisible_by_int smul_top_eq_top_of_divisible_by_int
pow_left_surj_of_rootable_by:
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Jujian Zhang
-/
@[to_additive smul_right_surj_of_divisible_by]
theorem pow_left_surj_of_rootable_by [rootable_by A α] {n : α} (hn : n ≠ 0) :
    function.surjective (fun a => pow a n : A → A) := fun x => ⟨rootable_by.root x n, rootable_by.root_cancel _ hn⟩
#align pow_left_surj_of_rootable_by pow_left_surj_of_rootable_by
